targets.query:
from(bucket: "${CID}")
  |> range(start: time(v:${linear_start}), stop: time(v:${linear_end}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "only_test_raw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["MID"] == "${MID}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["axis"] == "X" or r["axis"] == "Y" or r["axis"] == "Z")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${detailed_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
